info.title: USA Today Music Reviews
info.description: The USA TODAY Music Reviews API provides a method for retrieving USA TODAY music review content. In addition to the textual content of a review, the API returns various types of metadata associated with each title. All reviews information is available in a JSON handler.

get.description: The USA TODAY Best-Selling Books API provides a method for retrieving the weekly list of the nationu2019s top-selling books as compiled by USA TODAY and published each Thursday. In addition, the API can be used to access a titles history on the list and metadata about each title. All bestseller information is available in a custom handler.

parameters.name: api_key
parameters.description: The API key used for the query

parameters.name: author
parameters.description: Book by author

parameters.name: categories
parameters.description: A call to the /categories directory returns a list of categories used to classify books.

parameters.name: class
parameters.description: A call to the /classes directory returns a list of available book classes (fiction or non-fiction).

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Programmers may specify the number of books they would like returned in a list.

parameters.name: dates
parameters.description: Specifying a year within the dates directory returns the dates of each weekly books list for that particular year.

parameters.name: maxyear
parameters.description: Programmers can use minyear and maxyear to establish a year range for the data returned.

parameters.name: minyear
parameters.description: Programmers can use minyear and maxyear to establish a year range for the data returned.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: A call to the /titles directory returns a list of titles that have appeared on the books list.

get.summary: The USA TODAY Movie Reviews API provides a method for retrieving USA TODAY movie review content. In addition to the textual content of a review, the API returns various types of metadata associated with each title. All reviews information is availabl
get.description: The USA TODAY Movie Reviews API provides a method for retrieving USA TODAY movie review content. In addition to the textual content of a review, the API returns various types of metadata associated with each title. All reviews information is available in a JSON handler.

parameters.name: actors
parameters.description: Returns a list of all available actors featured in a movie review.

parameters.name: api_key
parameters.description: The API key used for the query

parameters.name: directors
parameters.description: Returns a list of all available directors featured in a movie review.

parameters.name: movies
parameters.description: Returns a list of all available movie reviews.

parameters.name: recent
parameters.description: By default, returns the most 25 most recent reviews. The number of reviews returned may be altered using the count parameter.

get.description: The USA TODAY Music Reviews API provides a method for retrieving USA TODAY music review content. In addition to the textual content of a review, the API returns various types of metadata associated with each title. All reviews information is available in a JSON handler.

parameters.name: albums
parameters.description: Returns a list of all available album reviews.

parameters.name: api_key
parameters.description: The API key used for the query

parameters.name: artist
parameters.description: Returns a list of all available artists who have had an album reviewed.

parameters.name: countries
parameters.description: Use this value to set the number of reviews returned. By default, mostrecent directory returns 25 reviews and the book and author directories return all avaialable information.

parameters.name: maxrating
parameters.description: Use these parameters to set a minimum and/or maximum rating for the album or movie review returned.

parameters.name: minrating
parameters.description: Use these parameters to set a minimum and/or maximum rating for the album or movie review returned.

parameters.name: recent
parameters.description: By default, returns the most 25 most recent reviews. The number of reviews returned may be altered using the count parameter.

parameters.name: year
parameters.description: Use this parameter to limit data returned to a specific year.
